TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpTransportSecurity extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the transport-level security settings for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> to set the transport-level security settings for a binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::HttpClientCredentialType ClientCredentialType { System::ServiceModel::HttpClientCredentialType get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::HttpClientCredentialType value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication.
Docs.value: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of client credential to be used for authentication.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The return value can be one of the following enumeration members:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Basic>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Certificate>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Digest>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Ntlm>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Windows>
## Examples The following code shows how to access and set this property.
[!code-csharp[c_ProgrammingSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_programmingsecurity/cs/source.cs#11)] [!code-vb[c_ProgrammingSecurity#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_programmingsecurity/vb/source.vb#11)]

Docs.exception: Setting the property to an undefined value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::HttpProxyCredentialType ProxyCredentialType { System::ServiceModel::HttpProxyCredentialType get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::HttpProxyCredentialType value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
Docs.value: One of the enumeration values that indicates the type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The return value can be one of the following enumeration members:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Basic>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Digest>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Ntlm>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.Windows>

Docs.exception: Setting the property to an undefined value.
